imdb.plot outline: A precedent-setting documentary unlike any film about animal cruelty, explores the sociological and spiritual factors that contribute to the condition of disconnect in our society and how it relates to the iniquitous and inhumane treatment of animals. The film will also expose the dog and cat fur trade, a largely unknown animal protection issue, and bring it into the international spotlight. This spiritually evocative film speaks from the soul perspective and is a calling for transformational social evolution of our planet. The film's message will awaken the conscience of humanity, bring to light the consequential effect of an egocentric society, intuitively evolve the collective consciousness toward fundamental and sustainable change, and engender compassion, empathy and peace on our planet.
imdb.title: Cry of the Innocent: The Voices That Can't Speak
akas: Cry of the Innocent: The Voices That Can't Speak (United States)
plot: A precedent-setting documentary exploring the sociological and spiritual factors that contribute to the iniquitous and inhumane treatment of animals, with its center on the fur trade as a paradigm of a larger nemesis permeating our world.::Kathleen Lowson, Filmmaker

A precedent-setting documentary unlike any film about animal cruelty, explores the sociological and spiritual factors that contribute to the condition of disconnect in our society and how it relates to the iniquitous and inhumane treatment of animals. The film will also expose the dog and cat fur trade, a largely unknown animal protection issue, and bring it into the international spotlight. This spiritually evocative film speaks from the soul perspective and is a calling for transformational social evolution of our planet. The film's message will awaken the conscience of humanity, bring to light the consequential effect of an egocentric society, intuitively evolve the collective consciousness toward fundamental and sustainable change, and engender compassion, empathy and peace on our planet.::Kathleen Lowson, Filmmaker
